languages.text: "Приказом Вольного Торговца были казнены леди Моллес-Секандас, ее дети, оба ее мужа, а также — без какого-либо следствия — функционер Администратума. Таковой вердикт оставил семейные дела, принадлежавшие Моллесам и Секандасам, без достойных управляющих, что катастрофически понизило эффективность важных для Империума производств. Также из-за внезапной казни вышеупомянутый функционер не успел передать дела преемникам, из-за чего значительно пострадал документооборот департаментов Администратума".

"The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."
languages.original_text: "Приказом Вольного Торговца были казнены леди Моллес-Секандас, ее дети, оба ее мужа, а также — без какого-либо следствия — функционер Администратума. Таковой вердикт оставил семейные дела, принадлежавшие Моллесам и Секандасам, без достойных управляющих, что катастрофически понизило эффективность важных для Империума производств. Также из-за внезапной казни вышеупомянутый функционер не успел передать дела преемникам, из-за чего значительно пострадал документооборот департаментов Администратума".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. Also due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

"The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. Also due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which did significant damage to the document workflow of nine Administratum departments."

"The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, into whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left both the Molles and the Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of great importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Exekution von Lady Molles-Secundas, ihrer Kinder, ihrer beiden Ehemänner und des Funktionärs des Administratums angeordnet, in dessen Fall keine formelle Untersuchung eingeleitet wurde. Infolge des Urteils war das Familienunternehmen der Molles und Secundas ihres Managements beraubt, was einen katastrophalen Rückgang der Effizienz für das Imperium wichtiger Produktionsanlagen nach sich zog. Überdies hatte besagte Funktionärin aufgrund ihrer unerwarteten Hinrichtung keine Zeit, die Verantwortung an ihre Nachfolger zu übergeben, was sich nachhaltig auf die Operationen der verschiedenen Abteilungen des Administratums auswirkte."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Exekution von Lady Molles-Secundas, ihrer Kinder, ihrer beiden Ehemänner und des Funktionärs des Administratums angeordnet, in dessen Fall keine formelle Untersuchung eingeleitet wurde. Infolge des Urteils war das Familienunternehmen der Molles und Secundas ihres Managements beraubt, was einen katastrophalen Rückgang der Effizienz für das Imperium wichtiger Produktionsanlagen nach sich zog. Überdies hatte besagte Funktionärin aufgrund ihrer unerwarteten Hinrichtung keine Zeit, die Verantwortung an ihre Nachfolger zu übergeben, was sich nachhaltig auf die Operationen der verschiedenen Abteilungen des Administratums auswirkte."

"{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} befahl die Hinrichtung von Lady Molles-Secundas, ihren Kindern und beiden Gatten sowie eines Funktionärs des Administratums, in dessen Fall es keinerlei offizielle Untersuchung gegeben hatte. Das Urteil hinterließ die Familienunternehmen Molles und Secundas ohne würdige Verwalter, was zu einem katastrophalen Einbruch der Effektivität von Produktionsstätten führte, die für das Imperium von einiger Bedeutung sind. Aufgrund der unerwarteten Hinrichtung hatte besagter Funktionär zudem keine Zeit, seine Pflichten einem Nachfolger zu übertragen, was den Dokumentenfluss in neun Abteilungen des Administratums signifikant schädigte."

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné l'exécution de dame Molles-Secundas, ses enfants, ses deux maris et un fonctionnaire de l'Administratum. Aucune enquête officielle n'a été diligentée pour ce dernier. Ce verdict a privé les entreprises familiales Molles et Secundas de responsables compétents. Ceci a entraîné un déclin catastrophique de la production dans des usines d'importance capitale pour l'Imperium. De surcroît, en raison de son exécution inattendue, le fonctionnaire susmentionné n'a pas pu transférer ses responsabilités à ses successeurs, ce qui eut un impact non négligeable sur le bon fonctionnement des départements de l'Administratum. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné l'exécution de dame Molles-Secundas, ses enfants, ses deux maris et un fonctionnaire de l'Administratum. Aucune enquête officielle n'a été diligentée pour ce dernier. Ce verdict a privé les entreprises familiales Molles et Secundas de responsables compétents. Ceci a entraîné un déclin catastrophique de la production dans des usines d'importance capitale pour l'Imperium. De surcroît, en raison de son exécution inattendue, le fonctionnaire susmentionné n'a pas pu transférer ses responsabilités à ses successeurs, ce qui eut un impact non négligeable sur le bon fonctionnement des départements de l'Administratum. »

« {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a ordonné l'exécution de dame Molles-Secundas, ses enfants, ses deux maris et d'un fonctionnaire de l'Administratum. Aucune enquête officielle n'a été ouverte pour ce dernier. Ce verdict a privé les entreprises familiales Molles et Secundas de responsables compétents. Ceci a entraîné un déclin catastrophique de la production dans des usines d'importance capitale pour l'Imperium. En raison de son exécution inattendue, le fonctionnaire susmentionné n'a pas pu céder ses responsabilités à ses successeurs, ce qui eut un impact non négligeable sur le flux administratif de neuf départements de l'Administratum. »

languages.text: “行商浪人下令处决了莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人、她的孩子们、她的两任丈夫，以及内政部一名职员。这位内政部职员没有经过任何官方调查，就遭到了处决。这样的判决导致莫莱斯家族与塞孔达斯家族企业失去了称职的管理者，许多对帝国至关重要的生产设施受到影响，生产效率大幅下滑。不仅如此，由于内政部职员遭到突然处决，未能将自己的职责及时移交给继任者，内政部众多部门的正常运作也遭受了严重干扰。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人下令处决了莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人、她的孩子们、她的两任丈夫，以及内政部一名职员。这位内政部职员没有经过任何官方调查，就遭到了处决。这样的判决导致莫莱斯家族与塞孔达斯家族企业失去了称职的管理者，许多对帝国至关重要的生产设施受到影响，生产效率大幅下滑。不仅如此，由于内政部职员遭到突然处决，未能将自己的职责及时移交给继任者，内政部众多部门的正常运作也遭受了严重干扰。”
“行商浪人下令处决了莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人、她的孩子们、她的两任丈夫，以及内政部一名职员。这位内政部职员没有经过任何官方调查，就遭到了处决。这样的判决导致莫莱斯家族与塞孔达斯家族企业失去了称职的管理者，许多对帝国至关重要的生产设施受到影响，生产效率大幅下滑。此外，由于内政部职员遭到突然处决，未能将自己的职责及时移交给继任者，内政部九个部门的工作流程也因此遭受了重大损害。”

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó la ejecución de lady Molles-Secundas, sus hijos y sus dos maridos, así como la de un funcionario del Administratum sobre cuyo caso no se había producido ninguna investigación formal. El veredicto privó a las empresas de las familias Molles y Secundas de un liderazgo competente, lo que resultó en una caída catastrófica en la producción de instalaciones importantes para el Imperium. Además, la inoportuna ejecución impidió al funcionario mencionado con anterioridad repartir sus responsabilidades entre sus sucesores, lo que influyó considerablemente en los trámites de diversos departamentos del Administratum».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó la ejecución de lady Molles-Secundas, sus hijos y sus dos maridos, así como la de un funcionario del Administratum sobre cuyo caso no se había producido ninguna investigación formal. El veredicto privó a las empresas de las familias Molles y Secundas de un liderazgo competente, lo que resultó en una caída catastrófica en la producción de instalaciones importantes para el Imperium. Además, la inoportuna ejecución impidió al funcionario mencionado con anterioridad repartir sus responsabilidades entre sus sucesores, lo que influyó considerablemente en los trámites de diversos departamentos del Administratum».

«{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ordenó la ejecución de lady Molles-Secundas, sus hijos y sus dos maridos, así como la de un funcionario del Administratum sobre cuyo caso no se había producido ninguna investigación formal. El veredicto privó a las empresas de las familias Molles y Secundas de un liderazgo competente, lo que resultó en una caída catastrófica en la producción de instalaciones importantes para el Imperium. Además, la inoportuna ejecución impidió al funcionario mencionado con anterioridad repartir sus responsabilidades entre sus sucesores, lo que perjudicó considerablemente al flujo de trabajo documental de nueve departamentos del Administratum».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは、レディ・モレス・セクンダス、その子供たち、そして両名の夫たちに加え、正式な調査が一切行われていなかった、ある帝国行政局の役人の処刑を命じました。この判決により、モレス家とセクンダス家の事業は有能な経営者を失い、帝国にとって重要な生産施設の効率が壊滅的に低下しました。その上、予期せぬ処刑のため、前述の役人は後任者に職務を引き継ぐ時間がなく、それが帝国行政局の各部門の業務に大きな影響を与えました」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは、レディ・モレス・セクンダス、その子供たち、そして両名の夫たちに加え、正式な調査が一切行われていなかった、ある帝国行政局の役人の処刑を命じました。この判決により、モレス家とセクンダス家の事業は有能な経営者を失い、帝国にとって重要な生産施設の効率が壊滅的に低下しました。その上、予期せぬ処刑のため、前述の役人は後任者に職務を引き継ぐ時間がなく、それが帝国行政局の各部門の業務に大きな影響を与えました」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in emriyle Leydi Molles-Secundas, çocukları, iki kocası ve herhangi bir resmî soruşturma yürütülmeden bir Administratum görevlisi infaz edildi. Bu karar, Molles ve Secundas aile işletmelerini ehil yöneticilerden yoksun bırakarak İmparatorluk için önemli üretim merkezlerinin veriminde yıkıcı düşüşe yol açtı. Ayrıca beklenmedik idamdan dolayı söz konusu işyarın haleflerine görev devri yapacak zamanı olmadığından, dokuz farklı Administratum dairelerinin faaliyetleri büyük oranda etkilendi."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader ordered the execution of Lady Molles-Secundas, her children, and both her husbands, as well as a functionary of the Administratum, in whose case there had been no formal investigation of any kind. The verdict left the Molles and Secundas family enterprises with no worthy managers, resulting in a catastrophic decline in the efficiency of production facilities of importance to the Imperium. In addition, due to the unexpected execution, the aforementioned functionary had no time to hand over his responsibilities to his successors, which significantly affected the operations of the departments of the Administratum."

Bu karar, Molles ve Secundas aile işletmelerini ehil yöneticilerden yoksun bırakarak İmparatorluk için önemli üretim merkezlerinin veriminde yıkıcı düşüşe yol açtı. Ayrıca beklenmedik idamdan dolayı söz konusu işyarın haleflerine görev devri yapacak zamanı olmadığından, dokuz farklı Administratum dairelerinin faaliyetleri büyük oranda etkilendi."

"Hür Tacir'in emriyle Leydi Molles-Secundas, çocukları, iki kocası ve herhangi bir resmi soruşturma yürütülmeden bir Administratum görevlisi infaz edildi. Bu karar, Molles ve Secundas aile işletmelerini ehil yöneticilerden yoksun bırakarak İmparatorluk için önemli üretim merkezlerinin veriminde yıkıcı düşüşe yol açtı. Ayrıca beklenmedik idamdan dolayı söz konusu işyarın haleflerine görev devri yapacak zamanı olmadığından, dokuz farklı Administratum dairesinin evrak akışı ağır hasar aldı."
